definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media

sentences.english: The Beijing South Railway Station sees around fifty thousand passengers departing every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京南站每天有將近5萬客流量。

sentences.english: Can you apply that outside of high-traffic Web sites?
sentences.chinese: 能否把這樣的方法應用到大規模流量網站之外的應用？

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在進行投資決定前，你會先詳閱綜合現金流量表。

sentences.english: Mr. Freed has also cut water use by installing ultra-low-flow shower heads.
sentences.chinese: 弗瑞德先生也安裝了超低流量的花灑省水。

sentences.english: Isothermal chamber is a new kind of measuring installment used to test pneumatic component flow rate characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 等溫容器是一種新型氣動元件流量特性測量裝置。

sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 煙道氣樣品的監控系統速率成正比的煙氣體積流量。

sentences.english: Flowrate insufficient or too low head.
Filter can be fully restored after the Qing brush water flow.
sentences.chinese: 濾芯清刷後可完全恢復水流量。

sentences.english: Design of multi-channel audio retrieval system based on melody;
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種多聲道超聲氣體流量計的電路設計。

sentences.english: The router's role is then to move traffic between the VLANs.
sentences.chinese: 這時，路由器的作用就是在VLAN之間傳遞流量。

sentences.english: Shut off head equals 125% of head of normal flow.
sentences.chinese: 泵的關閉壓頭爲正常流量時壓頭的125%。

sentences.english: Depending on the characteristics of products used and on the type of stators and rotors.
sentences.chinese: 根據產品使用特點及定子和轉子的類型確定流量。

sentences.english: The increase of the deepness of the tap hole will reduce the flow on the bottom of hearth.
sentences.chinese: 死鐵層深度加大時，通過爐底的鐵水流量減小。

sentences.english: This paper reports a new method of tryptophan clearance technique to measure hepatic blood flow non-invasively.
sentences.chinese: 報道用色氨酸清除技術檢測犬肝血流量。

sentences.english: The calculation of the volume of urban agglomerations.
Application-layer traffic identification and control is the precondition of network billing and management.
sentences.chinese: 應用層流量識別及控制是網絡計費和網絡管理的前提。

to increase followers/to get more fans
